PatientPop | Santa Monica, CA | Onsite & Remote | Senior & Lead Software Engineers

Currently splitting monolith codebase into microservices and pushing company towards more traditional SASS business model with less manual tasks.

- Experience with at least one of the following programming languages: Python, Ruby, C#, PHP or Java. Preferably with a MVC framework such as Laravel, CodeIgniter, CakePHP, Ruby on Rails or similar frameworks. - Backbone & VueJS Frontend - A solid grounding in Computer Science fundamentals, data structures, algorithms, and deftness at object-oriented design and systems architecture - Experience working with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc)

Message me if interested or apply here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/patientpop
